WithdrawPartialBorrow.Withdrawn: Cannot withdraw as you have already withdrawn !!
WithdrawPartialBorrow.Spent: Cannot withdraw as your loan is spent. You must revert spend to Withdraw
WithdrawPartialBorrow.Eligible: You can withdraw only once, choose amount cautiously !!

RevertSpend.NotSpent: Cannot revert spend as your loan is not spent

WithdrawCollateral.NotRepaid: Cannot withdraw collateral as your loan is not repaid
WithdrawCollateral.TimelockNotExpired: Cannot withdraw collateral as your timelock is not over. You can withdraw after

Spend.Spent: Cannot Spend as you have already spent your loan

Repay.CommitmentNotExpired: You are preclosing your loan, encurring a fee. You have
